timeline.message:
Remove dependencies from gradle

   * Remove appcompat-v4 dependency
   * Change from runtime to compileOnly appcompat-v7 dependency
   * Add log for when no location permissions added on Manifest

timeline.bodyText: This can be an info, as it it isn't an error if  they don't have that class in their app.
timeline.author: jkasten2

replies.bodyText: @Jeasmine This line is still using OneSignal.LOG_LEVEL.ERROR. Should be INFO.
replies.author: jkasten2
